document_name: National Action Programme to Combat Desertification in Morocco
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/MAR/2013/MAR-2013-01-06-National Action Programme to Combat Desertification in Morocco_0af2bb389f715a9f09d6a640e5baeed9.pdf
document_description: This document aims at promoting the convergence, coherence and synergy of policies and programmes contributing to the fight against land degradation in order to ensure the sustainable management of ecosystems according to the land use, the restoration and maintenance of major environmental balances and contribute to strategic objectives of poverty reduction and food security. It defines a range of measures to increase adaptation capabilities.
